    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92326</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction with oxygen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion mit Sauerstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction à l'oxygène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação com oxigênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione con ossigeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση με το οξυγόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción con oxígeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the non-metallic elements of sulphur and phosphorus burning in oxygen to produce acidic compounds.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compounds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die nicht-metallischen 
Elemente des Schwefels und des Phosphors, die im Sauerstoff zu den 
säurehaltigen Mitteln des Erzeugnisses brennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les éléments non 
métalliques du soufre et du phosphore brûlant en oxygène aux 
composés acides de produit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os elementos não 
metálicos do enxôfre e do phosphorus que queimam-se no oxigênio aos
compostos acidic do produto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra gli elementi non 
metallici di zolfo e di fosforo che si bruciano in ossigeno ai residui
silicei dei prodotti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μη μεταλλικά στοιχεία του
καψίματος θείου και φωσφόρου στο οξυγόνο στις όξινες ενώσεις 
προϊόντων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los elementos 
nos-metálico del sulfuro y del fósforo que se queman en oxígeno a 
los compuestos ácidos del producto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säuren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
